snippet: Grieving for seven relatives who died when their car struck a median barrier on the Bronx River Parkway and fell off an overpass on Sunday spanned several generations and two countries.
abstract: Relatives, spanning two generations and two countries, are grieving for seven family members who died when their car struck a median barrier on the Bronx River Parkway; authorities are still investigating what caused Maria Nunez Gonzalez to loose control of vehicle.

byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and Randy Leonard contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Grieving for seven relatives who died when their car struck a median barrier on the Bronx River Parkway and fell off an overpass on Sunday spanned several generations and two countries.

headline.seo: Mourning Family Reflects on Its Past After Accident
headline.main: Mourning Family Reflects on Its Past After Accident
headline.print_headline: Mourning, A Family Reflects On Its Past
